name: Create a global hook
description: The `config` object can accept the following keys:

params.name: config
params.description: Key/value pairs to provide settings for this webhook. [These are defined below](#create-hook-config-params).

params.name: events
params.description: The [events](/v3/activity/events/types/) that trigger this webhook. A global webhook can be triggered by `user` and `organization` events.

params.name: active
params.description: Determines if notifications are sent when the webhook is triggered. Set to `true` to send notifications.

name: Edit a global hook
description:
Parameters that are not provided will be overwritten with the default value or removed if no default exists.

The `config` object can accept the following keys:

params.name: config
params.description: Key/value pairs to provide settings for this webhook. [These are defined below](#update-hook-config-params).

params.name: events
params.description: The [events](/v3/activity/events/types/) that trigger this webhook. A global webhook can be triggered by `user` and `organization` events.

params.name: active
params.description: Determines if notifications are sent when the webhook is triggered. Set to `true` to send notifications.

name: Ping a global hook
description: This will trigger a [ping event](/webhooks/#ping-event) to be sent to the hook.
